titleStmt.title: The deuills banket described in foure sermons [brace], 1. The banket propounded, begunne, 2. The second seruice, 3. The breaking vp of the feast, 4. The shot or reckoning, [and] The sinners passing-bell, together with Phisicke from heauen / published by Thomas Adams ...
titleStmt.author: Adams, Thomas, fl. 1612-1653.

titleStmt.title: The deuills banket described in foure sermons [brace], 1. The banket propounded, begunne, 2. The second seruice, 3. The breaking vp of the feast, 4. The shot or reckoning, [and] The sinners passing-bell, together with Phisicke from heauen / published by Thomas Adams ...
titleStmt.author: Adams, Thomas, fl. 1612-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Snodham for Ralph Mab, and are to be sold in Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the Grayhound,

notesStmt.note: Each sermon, except the first, has special t.p.
Part V has imprint: London : Printed by Thomas Snodham of Iohn Budge, 1614.
Includes the six sermons of STC 110--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
